JOB DESCRIPTION: You will be responsible for delivering high qualityperformance maintainable code      Go extra mile to identify issues in existing code and actively participate in code and product review meetings.      Work with senior engineers,  product managers to come up with best solution to real world problems.      Work on server side technology to maintain current products and build new software products.     Bring to the table new ideas for development.   Reviewing current systems   Presenting ideas for system improvements,  including cost proposals   Working closely with analysts,  designers and staff   Producing detailed specifications and writing the program codes     Testing the product in controlled,  real situations before going live     Preparation of training manuals for users     Maintaining the systems once they are up and running     Providing support to current clients.    Desired Qualification:     Years of Experience: 1- 5 Years      Proficiency in Mobile Development (Android is a must,  Additional iOS experience is a plus)     Highly proficient in Java.   Problem solving and quick learner.     Strong logical reasoning and ability to pick up programming languages on the job as per requirement.     Previous work with REST services and cloud infrastructure.   Previous work experience in Tech Startups.   Good sense of UIUX.   Efficient in software development design patterns and algorithms.   Provide software training to other employees.    If you feel you have the above qualifications and can make a difference please fill the form below and upload the latest copy of your resume.
